commandDescription: Sets SObject Level Security for a list of profiles.
profilesFlagDescription: List of profiles separated by commas. You can also use wildcards as part of this parameter to match on profile names (only ^,$,* are supported, ^ matches start of the profile name, $ matches end of the profile name and * matches one of more characters of profile name).
objectsFlagDescription: List of SObjects separated by commas.
readaccessFlagDescription: Read SObject permission, defaults to 'true'. Valid values are 'true' or 'false'.
createaccessFlagDescription: Create SObject permission, defaults to 'true'. Valid values are 'true' or 'false'.
editaccessFlagDescription: Edit SObject permission, defaults to 'true'. Valid values are 'true' or 'false'.
deleteaccessFlagDescription: Delete SObject permission, defaults to 'false'. Valid values are 'true' or 'false'.
viewallaccessFlagDescription: View All SObject permission, defaults to 'true'. Valid values are 'true' or 'false'.
modifyallaccessFlagDescription: Modify All SObject permission, defaults to 'false'. Valid values are 'true' or 'false'.
verboseFlagDescription: Output to screen in csv format, defaults to false unless --checkonly flag is set
checkonlyFlagDescription: Just display details, no updates are made to profiles, defaults to false.
